verses.text: But in the \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and it shall be \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* above the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*; and \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w flow|strong="H5102"\w* unto it.

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; and he will \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* us of his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and we will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*: for the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And he shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* among \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*; and they shall \w beat|strong="H3807"\w* their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* into \w plowshares|strong="H0855"\w*, and their \w spears|strong="H2595"\w* into \w pruninghooks|strong="H4211"\w*: \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* shall not lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* against \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, neither shall they \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* any more.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft pruninghooks: or, scythes\f*

But they shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* under his \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* and under his fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*; and none shall make \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*: for the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

For all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, and we will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will I \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* her that \w halteth|strong="H6760"\w*, and I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* her that is driven \w out|strong="H5080"\w*, and her that I have \w afflicted|strong="H7489"\w*;

And I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* her that \w halted|strong="H6760"\w* a \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w*, and her that was cast far \w off|strong="H1972"\w* a \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over them in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* from henceforth, even \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ And thou, O \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*, the strong \w hold|strong="H6076"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, unto thee shall it \w come|strong="H0857"\w*, even the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*; the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Now why dost thou \w cry|strong="H7321"\w* out \w aloud|strong="H7452"\w*? \add is there\add* no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in thee? is thy \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*? for \w pangs|strong="H2427"\w* have \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* thee as a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*.

Be in \w pain|strong="H2342"\w*, and labour to bring \w forth|strong="H1518"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, like a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*: for now shalt thou go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, and thou shalt \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add even\add* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; there shalt thou be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*; there the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* thee from the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

¶ Now also \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* are \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* against thee, that \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Let her be \w defiled|strong="H2610"\w*, and let our \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w look|strong="H2372"\w* upon \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

But they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, neither \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* they his \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*: for he shall \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them as the \w sheaves|strong="H5995"\w* into the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* and \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thine \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w* \w brass|strong="H5154"\w*: and thou shalt beat in \w pieces|strong="H1854"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and I will \w consecrate|strong="H2763"\w* their \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and their \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
